topic.title: How this solution works
topic.shortdesc: To not be confused, this is a description of how the solution works

ul.li: [DM] = can be do dynamic of manually

body.p: This is the description of the processes:

ul.li: [DM] Installation of agent FusionInventory to have complete inventory of this server
[D] Plugin Monitoring set ressources to this new server defined by rules
[DM] Restart Arbiter module of Shinken to get new configuration
[D] Shinken send events to GLPI MySQL database
[D] A system cron script update RRDTOOL files with these events and generate/update graphs
User can display events in GLPI or on it's android application

body.p: Like it's listed, add a new device to monitor is simply and not require human intervention to configure it.
